title: "Qatari startup Rimads wins InsurHack MENA 2022"
excerpt: "Qatari startup Rimads has won the InsurHack MENA 2022 competition for its healthcare solution Avey, at the inaugural hackathon event for the region. Rimads has been a partner company at Qatar Science & Technology Park (QSTP) since 2019 and has benefited from access to the full range of QSTP services and its extensive network of stakeholders,"
